pages.text: Harnessing the power of the winds, all potentially hostile creatures are blown away from the ritual area.$(br2)$(warning) It is possible for hostiles to become trapped on terrain. Be sure to modify the area accordingly.$(br2)$(info) No effect is had on strictly passive creatures nor on creatures that become hostile under certain circumstances.
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier II$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_windwall#multiblock)a standing stone and a runed pillar are required$(). Please see later pages.
A four-high $(l:rituals/standing_stones)runed pillar of spruce and a four-high standing stone$() are required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:windwall/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will search for within an area of $(ritual:windwall/radius_x) and $(ritual:windwall/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and $(ritual:windwall/radius_y) blocks vertically.$(br2)$(bold)Enforcement$(): Hostile creatures that stray within the $(ritual:windwall/distance) blocks of the ritual are blown back, with a knockback strength of $(ritual:windwall/knockback).
